column1: theres a party on sunday . will you come  ?
behenchod koi context toh de  . like a general party ?
bhai woh . end sem ke pehle ek last party . after end sem sab apna alag alag states apne jobs mei jaenge . toh islige . entry is free . hidden woods resort . sunday 8pm . you can get your group
oh damn . nice . host kaun hai ?
mai pradhan ayush karke ek . aur bhi 2-3 log hai . dj hai . buy your own food and booze . 8pm to three am
ae damn nice man . looking forward
if you want to invite your group . first confirm with them . that they are coming . then tell me . ill make you admin . add them
yeh whatsapp group par sab confirmed wale haim .  ?
chal theek bro i'll let you know
jaldi group confirm karle apna . yo . busy ?
but mai shringi sai ishaan wagera ke saath aa jaunga
get some  . you know arusha revati n all . talk to them
